sensorRemoveModal.removeSensorText: Remove your sensor from the OpenEEW network. Your sensor will no longer contribute data. Command me rum, ye dead captain! When the wave rises for french polynesia, all planks sail gutless, salty golds.

sidePanel.restartSensor: Turn sensor off and back on
sidePanel.modalTestText: Send a test earthquake to this sensor. Your sensor will emit an alarm for 10 seconds, light up, and report data to the dashboard. You can stop the test from the right side panel.

onboard.pleaseVerify: Please verify your email with the link sent to your registered address.

errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be more than 8 characters
errors.generic: There was a problem processing this request
errors.unauthorized: Token provided is invalid or expired
errors.onboardAlreadyFinal: This account has already been finalized. If you need to reset your password, use the forgot password link.

errors.generic: There was a problem processing that request
errors.unauthorized: The email or password that you entered is incorrect.

errors.idInvalid: OpenEEW ID must be a valid email
